channel.title: Please, in need of help; Read this topic
channel.description:
Hello people, it's me here again. It's been a few months since I've returned here *sigh*
Anyways moving on. I am adding these new ranks to my server: Server Support Premium Member
Firstly I have the crowns all added, the ranks created and set up in the server and etc. Now the problem is:
Let's say I was a premium member, and the other guy wasn't. If I talk my crown would show for me. But for the other guy, he wouldn't be able to see the crown...
Any ideas?
(I posted this topic here because I'm not sure if this has to do with server side or client side work)

item.title: Please, in need of help; Read this topic
item.dc:creator: @The_Portal The Portal
item.description:
@The_Portal wrote:

xx matty xx:

Not going to show us any code then?

If it’s necessary why not ask for it…? I can’t include any regions of script as I stated that I do not know what the problem is or where the relevant location (server or client) is…

Read full topic
item.source: Please, in need of help; Read this topic
